alert.note: Alert for Inyo (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 13 at 2:30PM PDT until September 13 at 3:15PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Inyo County in south central California... * Until 315 PM PDT. * At 229 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Darwin, or 23 miles east of Olancha, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickle size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs and trees. * Locations impacted include... Panamint Springs and Darwin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
